rules_text:
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. If that creature wasn't legendary, you lose 2 life.
Sequel {1}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its sequel cost. If you do, it enters with a finality counter and it's a 1/1.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I've had so much fun here. I never want summer to end.”[/i]
